title: Can't use app after install because of error Invalid array length argument on iOS 10.3.3
body:
### Description *Type*: Bug *Summary*: After app is launched there is popup `Invalid array length argument shown. if close the popup then white screen is shown. If re-launch app then same error is shown again, so user can't use app. ``` NAME: "TypeError" MESSAGE: Invalid array length argument Uint8Array@[native code] value@/var/containers/Bundle/Application/EFBBBBAE-9235-45E0-96F3-1DAACC702B76/StatusIm.app/main.jsbundle:27:928 value@[native code] ``` #### Expected behavior Can launch app after install and create new account #### Actual behavior After app is launched there is popup `Invalid array length argument shown. if close the popup then white screen is shown. If re-launch app then same error is shown again, so user can't use app. ### Reproduction https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803590-status/builds/8240620/sessions/6/?accessToken=FoOOg4pYAFcYXTyE6mhMZOZI-Zg - Install Status nightly build - Launch Status ### Additional Information * Status version: nightly build May 6 * Operating System: iOS 10.3.3, real iPhone 6s
TestFairy: Status 0.9.17 (2512) @6
Will not fix after setting OS limit to iOS 11 in #4651
